item.title: I Built an AWS Incident Response Toolkit (and You Can Use It)
item.description: After publishing my free AWS IR checklist, I decided to go one step further — a full incident response toolkit with Terraform code, automation scripts, and ready-to-use templates. Here’s what’s inside.

item.title: Monitoring AWS Security Events Without Breaking the Bank
item.description: Learn how to monitor security events in AWS with minimal cost. From native tools like CloudTrail and EventBridge to open-source SIEMs, we cover practical, budget-friendly strategies.

item.title: Securing Temporary Credentials in AWS: Best Practices for Safe Role Usage
item.description: Learn how to secure temporary AWS credentials using IAM roles, STS, and automation. Prevent misuse and follow least privilege best practices.

item.title: AWS Incident Response Playbook Template
item.description: A ready-to-use template for small security teams handling security incidents in AWS. Includes triage checklists, memory capture steps, and reporting structure.

item.title: Incident Response in AWS: A Playbook for Small Security Teams
item.description: A practical guide to incident response in AWS for small teams. Includes step-by-step playbook, memory acquisition techniques, and evidence handling in the cloud.

item.title: How I Passed the AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C02) Exam in 2025
item.description: My real-world journey passing the AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C02) exam. Study strategies, mistakes, resources, and tips for future candidates.

item.title: Building Least-Privilege IAM Roles with IAM Access Analyzer
item.description: Learn how to use IAM Access Analyzer to identify risky permissions, generate fine-tuned IAM policies, and integrate the tool into your AWS development workflow.

item.title: How to Detect AWS Root Account Usage (And Respond to It)
item.description: This guide walks you through detecting and responding to AWS root account usage using CloudTrail, EventBridge, SNS, and optionally Lambda or Slack. Includes Terraform examples and AWS Console workflows.

item.title: AWS Security Checklist 2025: 10 Critical Steps to Secure Your Cloud
item.description: The definitive AWS security checklist for 2025. Follow these 10 steps to protect your cloud environment from common vulnerabilities and misconfigurations.

item.title: IAM Users Are Dead: Modern AWS Access Control for 2025
item.description: Why AWS IAM users are obsolete in 2025 - and how to implement secure, scalable alternatives with Identity Center, OIDC, and temporary credentials.

item.title: 5 Critical AWS Security Misconfigurations (2025 Edition) – How to Find & Fix Them
item.description: A practical guide to the five most common AWS security misconfigurations in 2025 and how to fix them using the AWS Console and Terraform.
